oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dear Sister Superior Letter from Brother Richard
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Communications; Invitations; Musical revues & comedies; Theatrical productions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: President Brother Hyacinth Richard Gerlach invited area Sisters to attend a special dress rehearsal of "The Mikado" (performed by the Christian Brothers High School Choral Club and the glee clubs of Holy Names, Immaculate Conception, Sacred Heart, St. Agnes, and St. Thomas high schools) to be held at Ellis Auditorium on Sunday afternoon, Aprtil 12, 1953.

For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
